paytp.not-enough: You don't have enough %s! The teleportation fee is %s %s but you only have %s.
paytp.requester-not-enough: The other player does not have enough money to teleport.
paytp.no-home: You have not set a home yet.
paytp.set-home: Successfully set your current location as your %s!
paytp.receive:
Player %s wants to teleport to you... The request will expire in %s seconds.
Please select:
paytp.request.cancel.sender: Your teleport request to %s has been canceled.
paytp.tp-back: %s returned to the previous teleport point!
paytp.no-back: No teleport point to return to!
paytp.help.header.title: PayTp Command Help
paytp.help.intro: Below are all commands provided by this mod:
paytp.help.tp.dim.desc: Teleport to a dimension and coordinates
paytp.help.tp.player.desc: Request teleport to a target player
paytp.help.tp.back.desc: Return to your previous teleport point
paytp.help.req.accept.desc: Accept the most recent teleport request
paytp.help.req.cancel.desc: cancel your most recent teleport request
paytp.help.home.goto.desc: Teleport back to your set home
paytp.help.home.set.desc: Set your current location as home
paytp.help.note: Note: All teleports will cost currency based on distance and dimension.
paytp.config.title: PayTp Configuration
paytp.config.language.warning: You need to relaunch your client to get it reloaded!
paytp.config.mainCommand.tooltip: Set the main command name of the plugin
paytp.config.crossDimMultiplier.tooltip: Price multiplier when teleporting across dimensions
paytp.config.acceptCommand.tooltip: Command used to accept another player's teleport request
paytp.config.denyCommand.tooltip: Command used to deny another player's teleport request
paytp.config.cancelCommand.tooltip: Command used to cancel your own teleport request
paytp.config.expireTime.tooltip: How many seconds before a teleport request automatically expires
paytp.config.backCommand.tooltip: Command name to return to the previous position
paytp.config.maxBackStack.tooltip: Maximum number of previous teleport locations saved for back tracking
paytp.config.backMultiplier.tooltip: Price multiplier when teleporting back to the previous location
paytp.config.currencyItem.tooltip: Item ID used for teleport payment (e.g., minecraft:diamond)
paytp.config.baseRadius.tooltip: Distance range for minimum price; beyond this, price increases gradually
paytp.config.rate.tooltip: Price increase per block beyond the base radius
paytp.config.allowEnderChest.tooltip: Allow using Ender Chest for teleport payment
paytp.config.prioritizeEnderChest.toolti: If enabled, prioritize taking payment from Ender Chest
paytp.config.allowShulkerBox.tooltip: Allow using Shulker Box for teleport payment
paytp.config.prioritizeShulkerBox.toolti: If enabled, prioritize taking payment from Shulker Box
